product_name: Brooks Epiphany Stretch III SE Shorts - Women's
long_description: Run your best in the Brooks Epiphany Stretch III SE Shorts. With lightweight materials, a great fit and helpful features, they'll keep up with any pace you choose. Stretch-woven outer shorts wick moisture, dry quickly and breathe well. Sculpted mesh side panels enhance breathability. Moisture-wicking polyester crepe liner is lightweight, fast drying and buttery soft. Elastic drawcord waist personalizes fit; internal pocket stores a key. Front and back reflectivity. The semifitted Epiphany Stretch III SE shorts are not too tight and not too loose.
short_description: Run your best in the Brooks Epiphany Stretch III SE Shorts. With lightweight materials, a great fit and helpful features, they'll keep up with any pace you choose.
